Transparency.findings: FedEx provides concrete evidence of transparency in its AI practices through detailed blog posts and articles describing real-time data sharing, operational visibility, and responsible AI strategies. These sources collectively demonstrate FedEx's commitment to transparency in both internal operations and customer-facing technologies.

Fairness & Bias Mitigation.findings: FedEx demonstrates concrete actions to address fairness and bias mitigation in AI, including DE&I initiatives, ESG reporting with AI platform integration, and explicit discussion of fairness in algorithmic systems. These sources provide verifiable evidence of fairness principles and practices in FedEx's AI operations.

summary.overallFindings: FedEx Corporation demonstrates comprehensive and concrete Responsible AI practices across all seven pillars, with detailed evidence for transparency, fairness, explainability, and governance. The company provides clear documentation of human oversight, privacy, and public commitments, supported by a variety of verifiable sources. No major gaps were identified, indicating a mature and well-documented approach to Responsible AI. FedEx's practices serve as a strong example of industry leadership in responsible and ethical AI deployment.
